name: Spoiler Alert! You're the Killer. (DEMO)
description:
A hit at a bed & breakfast goes wrong when you wind up snowed in before you can get away.

Now, you’re trapped in here with eight other people, all trying to figure out who did it. If you’re here when the snow melts and the cops show up, you’re dead in the water. There’s only one option - kill everyone without being caught.

That’s easier said than done, though. There’s no way you can take on all of these people in one day, so you’re going to have to do this one at a time, under the cover of night. Who are you going to kill first? Who next?

Every night, the bodies pile up, the suspects dwindle, and avoiding suspicion gets harder and harder. Will you make it out scot-free, or will you fumble under the pressure?

//

This is only the DEMO for Spoiler Alert! You're the Killer., released for Halloween 2021. The official game will (hopefully) be released on Valentine's Day 2022, but we'll see! For more news, content, and updates, please refer to the official Tumblr blog for it, or my various social medias. Thank you, and happy Halloween!

[31.10.21] -- Release (1.0)
